sense.name: give approval
sense.commentary: APPROVAL[+event] blessing - the formal act of giving approval
sense.examples: He gave the project his blessing. His decision merited the approval of any sensible person. It took almost three years to get the approval of the FDA.

sense.name: favorable reception
sense.commentary: favorable reception, commendation - a feeling of liking something or someone good
sense.examples: Although she fussed at them, she secretly viewed all her children with approval. Words of approval seldom passed his lips.
